website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive and versatile countertop appliance for toasting and roasting.
pros: Cooks evenly and also works as a toaster oven with an easy-to-adjust temperature dial
A handy timer helps remind cooks when it’s time to eat
cons: Not big enough for very large chickens

customer_reviews.title: This was one of my best purchases. I was thrilled for the rosstiserie chicken
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my best purchases. I was thrilled for the rosstiserie chicken. Let the pictures do the talk. Any questions just let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Beto Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Like it even more than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I had to use it a couple of times to get a feel for how it cooks, as compared to the oven I used to use. But after only a few tries, it works great! One thing to look out for is that the entire exterior gets very hot while in use, so be careful touching it and don't let it sit against anything that could melt or burn.
customer_reviews.author: rhymnocerox

customer_reviews.title: Counter review
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this oven I read a lot of reviews. I thought well I'll take the bad with the good. It is great! We rotisseried (if that is the past tense) a chicken a few days ago and it turned out perfect. It was a 3 lbs and we tied up the legs and wings for easy turning. Clean up was fairly easy, remember to put the flat tray on the bottom and wipe the top down real well after. It is a larger oven so it takes a little longer for the toast.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hesleph

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE DANGEROUS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: A very dangerous defective product- After cooking the chicken for 1 hour the glass shattered 5 feet in the air- A very serious matter! DO NOT BUY THIS DEFECTIVE OVEN!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NeNe

customer_reviews.title: Great but no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Great little oven we use it for a lot of things. It doesn't heat up the house like the oven. We bought it for the rotisserie that is hard to use and no instructions. I made our second chicken in it tonight and it was a disaster like the first one. The chicken won't hardle turn you have to keep checking on it all the time because it stops working. We even bought a tiny chicken this time thinking the other was too big for the rotisserie. Not the case it just doesn't work well for rotisserie Keep the box for the photos because there are no instructions. The toaster oven part works well its nice to have around
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Duke

customer_reviews.title: Even toasting...
customer_reviews.text: With this toaster oven, you're getting what you ask for...sturdy buttons, screws as opposed to rivets, no internal rattling when you move it around. One of the problems people complained about was fixed...some will call it hilarious, others will call it ingenious (you can almost hear someone saying "What else you got"?)...Hey, if it works... Bottom line...I feel I got a good deal and will update when I learn what's what. But, I do know even toasting when I see it...I came, I saw, I even toasted!
customer_reviews.author: mindtour

customer_reviews.title: Works gerat especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item solely for the rotisserie and it works great. It says it will hold a six pound chicken, but I bought one around five pounds and it fit perfectly. You have got to tie it up or it won’t rotate properly. My cons are the prongs attached to the rotisserie that secure the chicken could be wider and it would be nice if there was a light in it. But you can’t beat it for $40. I don’t know if i’ll use it for anything else or not. It will definitely be used for chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my girlfriend who has never owned one and was perhaps somewhat skeptical. She has always used a standard kitchen oven ... but she hates her current standard oven. Since I gave this to her she has been extremely happy with it, the settings, and the results of the cooked meals. I have received several "thank you" and "another delicious meal" messages.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Not a safe product, poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Not a very well designed product. Rear heating rods burn food; 2 screws on either side of the inside panels don't allow for easy pull out of cooking tray, as a result I burned my palm; turn off is incorporated in with timer switch making it difficult to actually turn off oven.....very disappointed, definitely not worth the little effort put into designing it and not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Mary MacBride

customer_reviews.title: Poor design for rotisserie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the rotisserie only. It's very difficult to get the skewer in place with a chicken on it. And the tool that's included to remove the chicken and skewer is worthless. Just use rubber gloves and grab the chicken and wrestle it out. The temperature control is not accurate. I used an oven thermometer to figure out what the actual temp is at each setting: 450=525, 325=450, 300=400, 275=375, 250=335, 225=300 degrees. The manual is not helpful. The cooking times are not correct. 25 to 30 minutes per lb for a chicken at 350 to 450 degrees?
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster oven. Love the way it looks on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this oven. I hadn't had one for a while and forgot how convenient they are. Works great when you don't want to heat up the whole house with the full size stove in the kitchen. Very convenient for making about anything. We have the kids use it for personal pizzas and such. Works great to crisp up corn dogs after you microwave them (who wants to eat a soggy corn dog, right?).
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: You may never use your big oven again!
customer_reviews.text: I use the Rotisserie option a lot more than I ever thought I would. The bake and broil are accurate and super convenient for smaller meals you don't want to fire up the big oven for. The toast option is nice, but due to the distance between the heating elements, the toast tends to dry out all the way through, creating more of a Biscotti bisquit that may break your teeth, vs the brown toasted exterior with soft center that a regular toaster. Other than that last feature flaw, I use this thing DAILY ( for everything but actual toast) I would rename it: Mini Countertop Oven and Rotisserie and leave out the “toast” lol
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: I love the cakes this oven baked!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster oven for the SMALL toaster oven that it is. I can cook small pizzas in it that are not over 9 inches including the pan or I can cook them directly on the rack without a pan. It will bake, broil, toast or just keep food warm. I can cook anything in it, that you can cook in a regular oven if the item is small enough to put in this toaster oven. I baked a beautiful butterfly cake for my kids and it is so delicious! Love the new oven. Also The timer works perfectly which is the reason why I replaced my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha moller

customer_reviews.title: Nice countertop oven
customer_reviews.text: This countertop oven is very handy. It saves having to use a big oven many times because it's a good size. Perfect for a family of 2. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the rotisserie function is a little hard to use. It's a bit difficult to load when the oven is preheated. It does work though. There was quite a lot of grease splattered along the walls from roasting a whole chicken and the oven had to be completely cleaned. It does do a good job cooking various types of food.
customer_reviews.author: Pam J

customer_reviews.title: Maxi-Matic ERO-2008N Countertop Toaster Oven,
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my sister. She loved it until the bottom "burners" stop working. I doubt this gets resolved as it is out of the 30 day returns period... :( We shall see
customer_reviews.author: Gary P.

customer_reviews.title: cooks food good
customer_reviews.text: I like this. I only got the Rotisserie model. Its all I wanted. Cooks Chicken, Turkey Breasties and Pork Tenderloins perfectly! My only beef is with the spit forks? that hold onto the meat. I was actually looking for a Ronco but found out they went belly up back in April last year. The Ronco had the spit with dual rods that just held stuff in place. This cooker has 2 little forks. These little forks do 'OK' but tuff to keep a chicken nicely centered. All in all, this does exactly what I purchased it for. Rawtissessorizing meat! i will be buying another so I can have one at home and at work.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.S.

customer_reviews.title: It shut my mom up!
customer_reviews.text: I have listened to my crazy mother for almost two years compassion about her toaster oven, wishing she had a bigger one after her super old one died... "they just don't make them like they used to!" My brother bought her one last year for Christmas and she gave it back because she couldn't put a casserole dish in it! So one day I got irritated and found this one and had it delivered to her house. She has had this now for about six months and loves it! She cooks EVERYTHING in it, from casseroles to pizzas or even ribs! The only time she has used her oven since I bought her this was on Easter!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: ok product, heat temp is not ideal
customer_reviews.text: We use this to roast coffee beans..the rotisserie works great, however, we have noticed the temperature is not accurate and does not quite reach 425f in a reasonable time. It's not good if it takes 20 minutes for this to happen..might as well use a full-size oven. Of course, our use to roast coffee beans is not common, but if I were cooking with this then I would want to know the info above as electricity is not free.
customer_reviews.author: NationalSource

customer_reviews.title: Low quality rotisserie spit
customer_reviews.text: The prints to hold food are of very low quality. Not at all pleased with this item. Would not recommend and would return if I could. Poor design and not functional for rotisserie’s except very small items (like a dove size bird)!
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA J.

customer_reviews.title: Friggin great!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great appliance and I'm super glad this is my first toaster oven. Only issue I've had is when you get past 400° it seems to be hotter then set temp. For example if it needs to be 425° I'll put at 405° ish and that is plenty. Otherwise super easy to use, very versatile, easy to clean and just so dang convient. Also looks very sharp, I only use my oven and stove now for things that are to large to fit or need to be cooked stove top! Definitely very satisfied and happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to understand, so it's very easy to use! We like that it is so versatile - broal / bake / rotisserie (chicken kebabs, sausages, hot dogs, etc - we also bought the piece with rods that fits onto the rotisserie shank) The larger size makes it very easy to clean / keep clean. I cut up a copper cooking mat to fit inside the bottom so just pull out, shake off in the trashcan and rinse in sink
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Price ok for value . Good product over all.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t fit a good size chicken well, it keeps hitting the roof while rotating . Rotisserie roller and central bar is not well engineered. But product works well once mounted .. yummy chicken ready to enjoy. It’s not good for kabobs, dried it too much.
customer_reviews.author: Cool magic

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control
customer_reviews.text: Temperature control doesn't work properly. Set it at 350 it went up 425. Tried again and set it at 300 and it went to 250. Overall a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett Soper

customer_reviews.title: good size
customer_reviews.text: liked everything about it BUT the rotisserie did not work. would have ask for a exchange but waited so long to even use it that it was too late to return. so if u get one try all the options out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: TALL MAN

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about. Came with a lot of accessories. Gets hot quick and seems to control temps well, even though I didn’t measure with a thermometer. Pretty decent size that I use for crafting and lure building.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a good buy. Works fine. Just minor details that I didnt consider when buying
customer_reviews.text: So far this product is good for the price. There are a few issues that I have come across. Such as the temperature isnt evenly distributed throughout the device. Also given the slight slant to the device the top has a shorter depth than the bottom.and the heating elements are exposed
customer_reviews.author: FPerry

customer_reviews.title: Holy Rotisserie!
customer_reviews.text: Too small!! Oven isn't large enough for a family. The Rotisserie is so close to the top of the oven you can end up touching the heat coil with your food while loading!!😞😞😞😞
customer_reviews.author: Renea Sims

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worst oven to use! When in use the top & sides become extremely hot so moving it or opening it is difficult. It heats up the whole room & doesn’t have a slide out tray making it hard not to burn yourself taking out the food. If I didn’t throw out the packaging ,I’d return it. Don’t waste your money! 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Joan Faktor

customer_reviews.title: Good helper for making cakes￼
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the product, I was looking forward to it. The packaging was very good and the size of the product was similar. I could n’t wait to use it at night. It was more convenient and worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: zoey

customer_reviews.title: I super recommend this oven.
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with this oven! I was concerned if the rotisserie would work and it does, I’m very happy with my purchase. Besides chicken you can cook any meat using the rotisserie function and you’ll have meat very similar to grilled, which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: ALINE DE CAMARGO SANTOS

customer_reviews.title: Was only able to use it once
customer_reviews.text: At only lasted one use and right after it broke apart and burnt up terrible product will be returning immediately
customer_reviews.author: Luis Perez Illlas

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: The oven on her stove would burn the biscuits. Bought this for the RV this thing works great. We have used the rotesirie a couple of times broiled steaks and baked cakes, muffins, biscuits, and cupcakes. My fiancee love this unit and we bought the roll around cart to put it on. No more burnt biscuits.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works great, not well insulated
customer_reviews.text: Gets very hot on top. Not as well insulated as it ought to be.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Bad replacement for Showtime
customer_reviews.text: We bought it as a replacement for a Showtime. Total disappointment... not big enough for even a medium-sized chicken, utterly brainless skewer system. Maybe it’s a great toaster, but don’t buy it as a rotisserie.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: Door handle was already broken in three places fresh out of the box
customer_reviews.text: OK. It's our fault to wait four months to open the box, so we are already outside the return window. But, we didn't expect the brand new oven to come with the plastic door handle broken into three pieces already. It is not something that can be reliably glued back together - see the broken pices sitting atop the oven and the still-shrinkwrapped accessory tray in the foreground. The product picture on Amazon.com shows a metal rod door handle.
customer_reviews.author: Zhihui Huang

customer_reviews.title: GREAT OVEN
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday present for mother-in-law. She loves it, it is perfect as she has no oven and lives alone. She can do everything she needs with this oven.
customer_reviews.author: Carol D.

customer_reviews.title: WE'RE COOKING NOW:
customer_reviews.text: This oven Elite Cuisine Product is just what we needed, it works great. I noticed it sure cooks a lot quicker than our old oven. We have been using the oven a lot, we have no complaint with oven. We are happy with our purchase. MREARLSC 07/01/19
customer_reviews.author: MREARLSC

customer_reviews.title: Cute Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and nice look...perfect counter size. Door just gets very hot when in use. Overall I definitely like.
customer_reviews.author: TDK

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you paid for. The rotisserie does not work well, would not rotate and keeps getting stuck. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Mango

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little oven!
customer_reviews.text: My regular oven broke so i needed something quick in the mean time. This is perfect! A wonderful little. I have baked pies, cakes, breads as well as lasagna, chicken etc. It is easy to use, quiet and bakes great!
customer_reviews.author: MariansGrandmother

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this oven. I brought it because my NYC apartment get extremely hot during the summer months when my stove is on. The temperature settings are not quite accurate but it definitely gets the job done. The rotisserie feature is AMAZING. I wish it had more parts for the rotisserie so that I could do other foods like vegetables or seafood.
customer_reviews.author: TrulyOriginal_2020

customer_reviews.title: Temp Learning Curve -- but absolutely worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so we've had this baby for a few months now and we do love it. It's definitely harder to control the temp, it seems to run way hotter than my regular oven, but it's really just a learning curve we need to get over and after that this is all convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran Wade

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected !
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised this little oven works well I haven’t used all aspects but for the price is great so far 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice toaster oven. Takes a slightly longer time to reach temp but cooks very evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as it looks and not centered.
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as it looks in their pictures. Also the hinge that holds the rod is closer to the top and not centered in the unit making it hard to use a full bird. You can fit a larger bird if you don't use the rotisserie but that's the reason I got it. Not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J Sabo

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best things I ever purchased from amazon. Great size. True temperature. Multiple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No paperwork.
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have with this product is that it didn't come with any instruction manual, warranty card, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Sato

customer_reviews.title: The numbers on the dials smudged
customer_reviews.text: Toaster works great. Does everything it's meant to, but the numbers printed on and around the dials smudged off when I cleaned it with a wet rag. Now I can barely tell what temperature I'm setting the oven to when I want to use that.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Anzaruth

customer_reviews.title: Terribly designed rotisserie for cooking a whole chicken.
customer_reviews.text: Great as a toaster oven, but if you’re buying this for the rotisserie feature, don’t bother. The pieces that hold the chicken on are poorly designed and can’t quite accommodate a 3 lb bird. Would be great for a pork tenderloin or other solid piece of meat but just not for a bird.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Like, great
customer_reviews.text: It's simple and beautiful. It's easy for novices to use. The capacity just meets the daily needs of life. You can do whatever you want later. Overall, I feel good. Although there is a little difference in the middle, customer service will help me solve the problem quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Toaster
customer_reviews.text: I liked the toaster, it has plenty of room, enough for a whole chichen, i also like it because it toasts my bagels fast
customer_reviews.author: LAButtercup20

customer_reviews.title: ❤
customer_reviews.text: It get really hot! So be careful makes the best whatever you put in it I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: It is "The ONE"
customer_reviews.text: All description about this product is right....besides, the name is just quality....Recommended....!...
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Elite Ero-2008N Toaster Over with Rotisserie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for the rotisserie capability and that works like a champ. It is a little too big to leave on the countertop, but that is to be expected. Looks good, works good and will probably last a long time; Anyhow, I hope so. Oh, yeah, the price was right, too.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Great Oven
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this oven, faster than regular oven, cools off faster, many different settings
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Watch cooking time or you have over done meat!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great but...it runs 🔥 HOT... Don't count on regular cooking times...it goes fast!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Santa Fe Deb

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to friends
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it. Right size, can set temperature manually, and can roast a whole chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet

customer_reviews.title: Good:)
customer_reviews.text: Love it I got it for the rotisserie for roast in my coffee it works perfect I even bought one that was used or returned works great
customer_reviews.author: Bill N

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Perfect size! I can now bake in the summer, in this Texas heat! Yes!!!
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift from my sister for Christmas. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Dial

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a 5lb chicken.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could rotisserie whole chickens. Frankly, it’s not big enough for a 5lb Chicken. The chicken scrapes the top or gets stuck on the heating bars. The rotation also isn’t strong enough to counteract the weight of the breast and it slips with every rotation. Not a great rotisserie for a standard size chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Fincher

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It does what I need it to do. Wish I had of ordered the one with the warmer on top like my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: N.S.

customer_reviews.title: missing a part-
customer_reviews.text: I just received this about a week or so ago and it toasts great, easy to clean, no problems except I went to do a rotisserie chicken and realized looking through the book I am missing the rod completely. Not happy at the moment. It was one of the reasons I wanted this.
customer_reviews.author: Towens

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this could not get it to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Canty

customer_reviews.title: the rotisserie
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about . The timer let's you know when the food is done . I bake a lot it's great and the toaster also Brown's your food .
customer_reviews.author: Liz Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Makes a ticking noise
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if because I have things sitting on top, but it does make a ticking noise while cooking (and no not the timer)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Klotz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: rotisery did not work but i got a refund for unit.
customer_reviews.author: Shon

customer_reviews.title: Ok not good for big chicken and very hot to touch
customer_reviews.text: It's ok not the greatest make sure nothing is next to it or on it though cause it will burn and catch on fire
customer_reviews.author: Evie njie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ROTISSERIE /OVEN!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster and rotisserie oven for the price. Highly recommend buying it!!!
customer_reviews.author: GoldenFurkids

customer_reviews.title: i love it
customer_reviews.text: use ir all the time and it has never fail me.
customer_reviews.author: leonard harrison

customer_reviews.title: It’s a Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oven! I cooked a lamb last week and it came out so tender. It is also easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: The size of the product
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a chicken roseittiere and it was delicious. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Abdel

customer_reviews.title: Very small and cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again, far to small to do a standard chicken
customer_reviews.author: Heribert galler

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for large size meats
customer_reviews.text: This has been awesome to use. I have cooked cornish hen, small to medium chickens, pork loins, and veggies in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broiling takes 30 minutes on 450 for ground beef- not user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Ii'm okay with the rotisserie part, but toasting, baking and broiling do not work well at all. id return if i could.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: It's worth every penny spent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great oven. Heats quickly and holds temperature even when opening the door.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Get very hot, very hot
customer_reviews.text: Ok it cook my chicken perfect, it wasn't dry it was good
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hines

customer_reviews.title: That this is a convenient way of cooking
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t anything I didn’t like about the item, I loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster oven. Large capacity. Very easy to keep clean. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this oven where I living doesn't have a oven this does the job just fine
customer_reviews.author: antoinette johnson

customer_reviews.title: Gets very hot
customer_reviews.text: Product works excellant and i really like the fact that it really bakes everything even
customer_reviews.author: nerissa d.

customer_reviews.title: Toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: My toaster oven was damaged. Didn't return because I needed for a dinner party.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the door dont close right but works good the door stays open looked like it wsa damaged
customer_reviews.author: steven soldinger

customer_reviews.title: Timer Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: The timer doesn't work on this oven. I've had quite a few things to burn because of it.
customer_reviews.author: HawaiiJazz

customer_reviews.title: Toaster Rotisserie Oven
customer_reviews.text: We really like our new toaster-rotisserie oven. It works great and we would definitely recommend this oven !
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Efficient
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Fast and efficient, also very quiet! Large size to fit most items, this way I don’t need to heat whole oven to make garlic bread!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Heats up really fast! Works just as good as my previous one that lasted me 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: SHould be fine when I use it
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for a Ronco rotisserie that quit working on christmas day. SHould be fine when I use it. Came packed great so no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and be using it a lot more than the oven.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend. Doesn’t even tell you how to assemble or ...
customer_reviews.text: Burnt the chicken. Missing a piece. I wouldn’t recommend. Doesn’t even tell you how to assemble or how to use
customer_reviews.author: Abby K. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Elite oven
customer_reviews.text: Love the oven and the size is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rezvan J. Kline

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome oven great price pain free shopping delivered right on time thank you
customer_reviews.author: susan ewans

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Dangerous!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very lucky. It could have burnt my house down. I was baking a pastry according to baking directions. It was to bake at 450 for 30 minutes. 10 minutes into baking I smelled burning. I found the pastry burnt both top and bottom and the parchment paper singed all around the pastry. When I picked the parchment paper off the baking sheet it crumbled into pieces. I then used an oven thermostat to test the temperature. I set the baking temp to 325. 10 minutes later it was reading 425. I stopped at this point. Imagine 450 plus 100 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: CC Harrell

customer_reviews.title: "Black"? I Don't Think So
customer_reviews.text: I specifically wanted a BLACK toaster oven and the description said that's what this was. In the product picture the top may look greyish because I thought it was a reflection. It is not: only the FACE is black. The description is misleading. I am keeping it because it is better than nothing. I put a 12X12 black tile on top to offset the GREY. Others said there are no instructions: just plug it in or do an internet search about the rotisserie. It is an ok size for small dishes. IT'S NOT BLACK!!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: G. H. Giroux

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Since I got this counter oven , I literally use it once a day to prepare my meals. (It got so many cooking methods). I normally use it for baking such as chicken wings, chicken tender and salmons. Most convenient and super easy to clean. I wrap the square pan with aluminum foil paper so when it’s done all I do is just change a new sheet of foil paper plus it come with handle tools that’s a plus. Great product for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Anson He

customer_reviews.title: Best oven. Beats higher priced models.
customer_reviews.text: I love this oven. It replaced my Cuisinart rotisserie oven which was less than a year old and cost $200. This little oven toasted better, cleans great and is big enough for a frozen pizza. I have had mine for several months now, I wanted to wait to review it.
customer_reviews.author: QueenKey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Oven
customer_reviews.text: The toaster is nice and you have to watch it to see how much you want your bread(s) brown. When you're done using it, then it cools down and makes a loud BANG sound!! It's a large size so make sure you have the space for it on your counter.
customer_reviews.author: KCee The Animal LoverTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Elite Cuisine ERO-2008N Countertop Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: Used this little oven a few times now and I am satisfied. Large enough to cook my rib steak in a timely manner yet light enough that I can storage it on top of the refrigerator when I have finished cooking. I could have spent twice what I spent but as it turns out this one fulfills all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Check the Dimensions
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! BUT...it is too big for my kitchen. I am not sure if all toasters get hot all around but this one gets really hot on top especially. Over all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little Cooks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter, and my grand daughters love it, they are learning to cook and this is great for them.They have made so many different dishes using it, My daughter said I couldn't of sent a better gift, She said it is easy to use and easy to clean. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Houchin

product_meta.title: Maxi-Matic Elite Gourmet Countertop Toaster Oven, 60-Min Timer with Stay-On Function Rotisserie, Bake, Grill, Broil, Roast, Toast, Keep Warm, 23L Capacity, 23 L, Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:RotisserieThe Elite Cuisine 5-Multifunction Countertop Toaster Oven Broiler is the perfect All-In-One Kitchen Appliance. A great addition to any kitchen, it can broil, bake, toast, keep warm and has a rotisserie function. Its large 23L/6 slice/0.8 cubic feet capacity cooks meals big enough for the whole family and can even bake up to a 12" pizza! With this many functions in a toaster oven, it was built to make cooking in the kitchen easy and convenient. The extra-large capacity of this toaster oven is perfect for your big holiday get-togethers or neighborhood parties. Consistent heating up to 450 Degrees F and 1500 Watts of power make this Countertop Toaster Oven Broiler the ultimate powerhouse!
feature_bullets: 6 Slice (0.8 cubic feet) for extra-large capacity
5 multi-functions for rotisserie, broil, bake, toast, and keep warm
Healthy rotisserie cooking for delicious poultry or roasts, while eliminating unwanted fat and grease
Adjustable temperature control knob from 150 Degrees F to 450 Degrees F
60-minute timer control knob with auto shut off and signal bell
